import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import * as action from "../../actions"; export default ({ id }) => { const [state, setState] = useState({}); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { data } = useSelector(state => state.productDetail); useEffect(() => { dispatch(action.getProductDetail(id)); }, [dispatch, id]) useEffect(() => { setState(data);; }, [data]) return (
